title: Create Customer Segment by Location
description: A marketer wants to send a promotion for a local event to all customers within a specific state.

tasks.description: Query the customer database for all customers whose shipping address is in 'California'.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of all customers in California.

tasks.description: Save the result as a new audience segment named 'California Customers'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully saves the new segment.
